name: Glider Sim (Tech Demo)
description:
Welcome to Glider Sim! 

This is an open world paragliding simulator takes place in Sun Valley, Idaho, USA. Use it to satisfy yourself when you can’t be flying in real life. This is an early demo and if you enjoy it please please pre-order the full version at a discounted rate on our Kickstarter!

Use Brakes (Turn)Arrow KeysWeight ShiftA/DRotate CamLeft Mouse Click

Game/ Joystick controller supported!

FEATURES INCLUDE:

  • Realistic simulated ridge lift with visual particles feedback.
  • Accurately placed thermals with visual particle feedback and in-game visualization.
  • Real life satellite imagery with accurately placed custom scenery objects.
  • Challenges with gold, silver bronze reward.
  • Realistic world flight physics with the ability to land or crash!
  • Choose your launch point, run and takeoff.
  • Ability to change graphics settings.
  • Choose your favorite glider design/ graphic.

Follow 5D Realities on Facebook and Twitter

This simulator is still very much in development so expect many more cool features to be added as we continue development!
